src_original: deyamapi niḥsvabhāvamiti jñeyam,  pariṇāmanāpi niḥsvabhāveti jñeyā,  yasya khalu pariṇāmanā kriyate,  tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvena jñeyam /  yadarthaṃ hi pariṇāmanā vidhīyate tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvenaiva jñeyam /
tathaiva upādātā deyaṃ dānaphalaṃ pariṇāmanā bodhiśceti tattasvabhāvena śūnyā iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
